casebody.data:
IN RE the PATERNITY OF Kyler S. POTOSKI, Riley N. Potoski, and Ellie R. Potoski Brent S. Potoski, Appellant-Respondent,
v.
Nicole Stotts, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 37A03-1704-JP-947 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED November 15, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

RILEY , J.

Affirmed in part, reversed in part, and remanded.

PYLE, J., Concurs.

ROBB, J., Concurs with concurring separate opinion.
